result.arabic_text: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٌ
result.translation: They wonder that a warner has come to them from among themselves[3], and the disbelievers say, “This is a magician and a liar!
result.footnotes: [3] The disbelievers demanded that an angel be sent to them to convey the message of Allah, not a human like themselves.
